attributes.background: There is most definitely an obesity crisis in UK schools.This can be resolved by making one hour of fitness compulsory in primary and secondary schools. Many schools have put in efforts to encourage students to be active,however most students ignore this and continue to consume sugar and laze around

rejection.details:
Physical Education is already part of the national curriculum, and is compulsory at all key stages. You can find out more about this here:

http://researchbriefings.files.parliament.uk/documents/SN06836/SN06836.pdf

We're therefore not sure what you would like the Government or Parliament to change.
